info.description:
My name is Jason. I'm 24 years old and most people would consider me a HUGE people person. A real chatty kathy at times, but usually followed up with laughter.

A little about me? I love football, I love weight lifting, I love racing cars and I love women. My god! They're beautiful. The shape they take simply by walking. How vulnerable they are in those tiny dresses. When they bend over straight legs....OO!! Like....it's not fair how sexiness just oozes from them without trying. The short shorts, tight shirts, cleavage, smooth lean legs....I freaking LOVE women.

Now, hopefully you're not labeling me as one of those jocks who could be one of the next calvin klein models. I don't think I'm anywhere close to being that attractive, but I have been told my entire life I'm "very handsome"...whatever that means. Maybe I just have my own self image issues.

Anyways. I'm not doing so well in life currently. Just lost my job, failed a class I can only take once a year for what was SUPPOSED to be my final semester at college for my degree. My apartment burned down with ALL my stuff in it. Only thing that survived was my little backpack of clothes I brought as a change from the gym with my toothbrush and my 'smell good' (cologne and deodorant). Oh! and the clothes I'm currently wearing. Outside of that, nothin. Fortunately my girlfriend let me crash with her while I'm getting on my feet again. She lives across the street from all the sororities. I thought when I first met her she was that typical sorority girl, considering where she lived, how she dressed, and how she looked...

speaking of...Did i say I love women? My girlfriend...JESUS. Bombshell 5'5''. 36 24 40. Gorgeous brown hair down to mid back. WIDE hips and phat ass (the kind that makes you double/triple take while when walking past). Tight toned arms and a slender upper body with two perky tits hanging for the world to see. Long smooth toned legs and dainty little hands and feet. Her voice is a little high for my taste, but it makes her just THAT much cuter.

Anyways. My life was at a low, but I had a bomb ass girlfriend.

Little did I know this would be my last 'normal' day for the rest of my life....
